channel.title: AzRoleWatcher
channel.description: Continuously monitor roles and permissions in Microsoft Entra ID and Azure.

item.title: ğŸ†• ADDED Entra role
item.description:
Id: adb2368d-a9be-41b5-8667-d96778e081b0
Display name: Agent ID Developer
Description: Create an agent blueprint and its service principal in a tenant. User will be added as an owner of the agent blueprint and its service principal.
Link: https://graph.microsoft.com/v1.0/directoryRoleTemplates/adb2368d-a9be-41b5-8667-d96778e081b0
